mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SLEEPOVER(memberid, universitycode, startdate, enddate, STATUS, SLEEPOVERREASON, sleepoverfilename, sleepoverfilesize) VALUES(#{memberId}, #{universityCode}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{status}, #{sleepOverReason}, #{sleepOverFileName}, #{sleepOverFileSize})
mapper.select: SELECT universitycode, startTime, endTime FROM SLEEPOVERTIME WHERE universitycode = #{universitycode};
SELECT idx, memberId, universityCode, startDate, endDate, status, sleepOverReason, sleepOverConfirm, sleepOverFileName FROM SLEEPOVER WHERE universityCode = #{universitycode} ORDER BY idx DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE SLEEPOVER SET Sleepoverconfirm='Y' WHERE idx=#{idx}
